mapper.select: SELECT et.year, et.month, et.grade, et.exam_type, es.subject, em.problem_number, count(*) AS wrong_count FROM jwland.exam_master em LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_type et ON em.exam_type_sequence_no = et.exam_type_sequence_no LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_subject es ON em.exam_subject_sequence_no = es.exam_subject_sequence_no GROUP BY et.year, et.month, et.grade, et.exam_type, es.subject, em.problem_number ORDER BY wrong_count desc
